Class ObstacleLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameFiles.ObstacleLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Obstacle
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BumperObstacleLine, PseudoPaddle

    public class ObstacleLine
extends java.lang.Object
implements Obstacle
    An obstacle line-Segment with two definite end-points.
    Version:
    v4.0 June 12th, 2014
    Author:
    Hock-Chuan Chua modified by Jason P'ng
